MAN.TITLE: pvm_parent
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: tid of the process that spawned the calling process.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : integer, the task identifier of the parent of the calling process.

DESCRIPTION.P: pvm_parent returns the tid of the process that spawned the calling process. If the calling process was not created with pvm_spawn, then tid is set to PvmNoParent=-2
